Authors: Fernando B. Matos, Alejandra Vasco, Robbin C Moran
Title:
Elaphoglossum doanense and E. tonduzii: new members of
Elaphoglossum sect. Squamipedia (Dryopteridaceae) and their significance
for inferring the evolution of rhizome habit and nest-forming leaves
within the genus
Keywords:
convergence; epiphytes; ferns; litter-trapping; phylogeny;
systematics
